attributes.name: description
attributes.content: Sunbird Energy Holdings Pty Ltd (“Sunbird”) is a private South African gas explorer and developer focused on southern Africa where limited domestic gas supply and growing energy needs have created significant opportunity for the development of large scale energy projects. Sunbird recently acquired and privatized all of the gas assets of ASX Listed company Interpose Holdings Limited (formerly known as Sunbird Energy Limited). Sunbird now owns a 76% interest in the Ibhubesi Gas Project, Block 2A, offshore of the west coast of South Africa and is the operator of the block.

body.value: Sunbird Energy Holdings Pty Ltd (“Sunbird”) is a private South African gas explorer and developer focused on southern Africa where limited domestic gas supply and growing energy needs have created significant opportunity for the development of large scale energy projects. Sunbird recently acquired and privatized all of the gas assets of ASX Listed company Interpose Holdings Limited (formerly known as Sunbird Energy Limited). Sunbird now owns a 76% interest in the Ibhubesi Gas Project, Block 2A, offshore of the west coast of South Africa and is the operator of the block. The Ibhubesi Gas Project is South Africa’s largest and yet to be developed independently certified gas reserves at 540 Bcf (2P) with independently certified “best estimate” prospectivity of close to 8 Tcf of gas. Joint Venture partner PetroSA, South Africa’s national oil company, holds the remaining 24%. The Ibhubesi Gas Project has multiple development opportunities to supply the South African energy market ongoing gas sales negotiations with Eskom for the provision of gas to the existing Ankerlig Power Station, various independent power producer opportunities and other potential industrial uses. Sunbird also has a portfolio of Coal Bed Methane (CBM) project across South Africa under development with pilot production being the next stage of development for the Mopane Project.
body.processed: Sunbird Energy Holdings Pty Ltd (“Sunbird”) is a private South African gas explorer and developer focused on southern Africa where limited domestic gas supply and growing energy needs have created significant opportunity for the development of large scale energy projects. Sunbird recently acquired and privatized all of the gas assets of ASX Listed company Interpose Holdings Limited (formerly known as Sunbird Energy Limited). Sunbird now owns a 76% interest in the Ibhubesi Gas Project, Block 2A, offshore of the west coast of South Africa and is the operator of the block. The Ibhubesi Gas Project is South Africa’s largest and yet to be developed independently certified gas reserves at 540 Bcf (2P) with independently certified “best estimate” prospectivity of close to 8 Tcf of gas. Joint Venture partner PetroSA, South Africa’s national oil company, holds the remaining 24%. The Ibhubesi Gas Project has multiple development opportunities to supply the South African energy market ongoing gas sales negotiations with Eskom for the provision of gas to the existing Ankerlig Power Station, various independent power producer opportunities and other potential industrial uses. Sunbird also has a portfolio of Coal Bed Methane (CBM) project across South Africa under development with pilot production being the next stage of development for the Mopane Project.

attributes.name: description
attributes.content: Petroline Holdings is engaged in the development and implementation of business projects in oil, gas and construction industries. Main products are Overhead Traveling cranes, Gantry cranes and Jib cranes and other related heavy weight lifting equipment like construction hoists, winches, grabs etc. (capacity from 5 up to 200 tons and more- upon Customer’s request) which might be effectively used in warehouses and workshops for lifting and transporting heavy weights thus economizing time, labor force, and energy.

attributes.name: description
attributes.content: Bui Power Authority (BPA) was established by an Act of Parliament, BPA Act 740, 2007 with a mandate to plan, execute and manage the Bui Hydroelectric Project, now the Bui Generating Station (BGS).  The BGS is a peaking plant with a capacity to generate 404MW of hydro-generated power, which is evacuated from our 161kV Switchyard. The Bui Hydroelectric Project was commissioned in 2013 and has been in operation up to date.

attributes.content: The University of The Gambia was established by an Act of the National Assembly of the Gambia in March 1999.  The enactment, which was a bold step to fulfill a long-standing desire of the people of The Gambia and to respond to several years of advocacy both within and outside the country for a university, ended years of indecision on the university question.

attributes.name: description
attributes.content: A pan-African institution that provides political risk insurance to companies, investors, and lenders interested in doing business in Africa. With deep roots in Africa, we are best positioned to understand and assess the risks here – and help mitigate them. With both a commercial and developmental mandate, ATIDI aim at improving Africa’s risk perception and attracting affordable investments in support of sovereign governments and the private sector.

attributes.content: Ghana Water Company Ltd | Project Pipeline

attributes.name: description
attributes.content: Ghana Water Company Limited (GWCL) is a utility company, fully owned by the state. The company is responsible for potable water supply to all urban communities in Ghana. GWCL currently operates eighty-eight (88) urban water supply systems throughout the country. Average production is about eight hundred and seventy-one thousand, four hundred and ninety-six cubic meters (871,496m3) per day (192 million gallons per day).

body.value: Ghana Water Company Limited (GWCL) is a utility company, fully owned by the state. The company is responsible for potable water supply to all urban communities in Ghana. GWCL currently operates eighty-eight (88) urban water supply systems throughout the country. Average production is about eight hundred and seventy-one thousand, four hundred and ninety-six cubic meters (871,496m3) per day (192 million gallons per day). Present potable water demand is estimated at one million, one hundred and thirty-one thousand, eight hundred and eighteen point eighteen cubic meters (1,131,818.18m3) per day (249 million per day).

attributes.name: description
attributes.content: Endeavour Mining Plc (Endeavour) is an intermediate gold mining company. It focuses on developing and operating low cost and long life mines in West Africa. The company's gold producing properties include Ity mine in Cote d'Ivoire; and Hounde, Mana, and Boungou mines in Burkina Faso. As a leading global gold producer and member of the World Gold Council, Endeavour is committed to the principles of responsible mining and delivering sustainable value to our employees, stakeholders and the communities

attributes.title: Greater Accra Metropolitan Area (GAMA) Sanitation & Water Project, Ghana

attributes.name: title
attributes.content: Greater Accra Metropolitan Area (GAMA) Sanitation & Water Project, Ghana | Project Pipeline

attributes.name: description
attributes.content: The GAMA Sanitation and Water Project for Ghana is World Bank grant of US$150 million to support the Government of Ghana’s efforts to increase access to improved sanitation and improved water supply in the GAMA, with emphasis on low-income communities and to strengthen management of environmental sanitation in the GAMA. The project has four components. The first component is the provision of environmental sanitation and water supply services to priority low-income areas of the GAMA. The second component is improvement and expansion of the water distribution network in the GAMA.

body.value: The GAMA Sanitation and Water Project for Ghana is World Bank grant of US$150 million to support the Government of Ghana’s efforts to increase access to improved sanitation and improved water supply in the GAMA, with emphasis on low-income communities and to strengthen management of environmental sanitation in the GAMA. The project has four components. The first component is the provision of environmental sanitation and water supply services to priority low-income areas of the GAMA. The second component is improvement and expansion of the water distribution network in the GAMA. The third component is planning, improvement, and expansion of GAMA-wide environmental sanitation services and the fourth component is the institutional strengthening of municipal, metropolitan and national institutions.
body.processed: The GAMA Sanitation and Water Project for Ghana is World Bank grant of US$150 million to support the Government of Ghana’s efforts to increase access to improved sanitation and improved water supply in the GAMA, with emphasis on low-income communities and to strengthen management of environmental sanitation in the GAMA. The project has four components. The first component is the provision of environmental sanitation and water supply services to priority low-income areas of the GAMA. The second component is improvement and expansion of the water distribution network in the GAMA. The third component is planning, improvement, and expansion of GAMA-wide environmental sanitation services and the fourth component is the institutional strengthening of municipal, metropolitan and national institutions.

attributes.content: NCB takes pride in developing and constructing a remarkable number of administrative, medical and educational projects on par with global standards, in addition to commercial malls, cutting-edge hospitals and residential developments across both Egypt and the Gulf.

body.value: NCB takes pride in developing and constructing a remarkable number of administrative, medical and educational projects on par with global standards, in addition to commercial malls, cutting-edge hospitals and residential developments across both Egypt and the Gulf. With an eye on the future and an impressive portfolio worth 5 billion EGP, NBC contributed to the development of the Latin District in New Alamein City while taking the lead in bringing to life some of the New Administrative Capital’s marker landmarks including the Egyptian Intelligence Compound, Cambridge School of Egypt and the New Capital’s thriving R5 district. Believing in the importance of strategic locations and the value they add to investments, NCB has left its mark on prime developments in New Cairo, Sheikh Zayed, 6th of October, in addition to a variety of sought-after coastal destinations such as the Red Sea and the North Coast.

attributes.name: description
attributes.content: Theorems Groups is a renowned professionally managed consortium of companies having offices in Asia, the Middle East and Africa. The first company under the group was established in the year 2004 in Mumbai, India under the brand name Theorems Designing India LLP and was operated from the residence of the partners. With backing from a dedicated and professional team and persistent efforts by the partners, the LLP was able to relocate to its owned office in Mumbai and within a short span, the LLP had branches in Delhi and Bengaluru (previously Bangalore).

body.value: Theorems Groups is a renowned professionally managed consortium of companies having offices in Asia, the Middle East and Africa. The first company under the group was established in the year 2004 in Mumbai, India under the brand name Theorems Designing India LLP and was operated from the residence of the partners. With backing from a dedicated and professional team and persistent efforts by the partners, the LLP was able to relocate to its owned office in Mumbai and within a short span, the LLP had branches in Delhi and Bengaluru (previously Bangalore). Today, Theorems groups have expanded its network and have independent companies and offices in the U.A.E, Central Africa, East and West Africa. The group is optimistic about the future with the ambition of having a global presence.

attributes.name: description
attributes.content: A global leader that has evolved from a local manufacturer of electrical products into an integrated infrastructure solutions provider; with over 18,000 employees and with recorded revenues of more than USD 4.8 billion in 2022. We Operate in five key business sectors: Wires, Cables & Accessories, Electrical Products, Engineering & Construction, Digital Solutions, and Infrastructure Investments. With a strong presence in 19 different countries, 31 production facilities spread across African and Asian countries including Egypt, Algeria, KSA, Qatar, Indonesia, Pakistan, and Tanzania.

body.value: A global leader that has evolved from a local manufacturer of electrical products into an integrated infrastructure solutions provider; with over 18,000 employees and with recorded revenues of more than USD 4.8 billion in 2022. With a strong presence in 19 different countries, 31 production facilities spread across African and Asian countries including Egypt, Algeria, KSA, Qatar, Indonesia, Pakistan, and Tanzania. attributes.name: description
attributes.content: Cut Rag Processors (Private) Limited was formed in February 2000 as the first independent cut rag production facility in Zimbabwe servicing both the domestic and export markets. Initially located in Auckland Road, Southerton, Harare for 12 years, the company is currently located in Bryce Road, New Ardbennie, Harare. Cut Rag Processors provides cut rag processing and supply services to most of the local Zimbabwean cigarette manufacturer’s requirements as well as catering to cut rag processing and supply services for regional and international customers.

attributes.content: Nigerian Institute of Town Planners (NITP) | Project Pipeline

attributes.name: description
attributes.content: Nigerian Institute of Town Planners is the leading body in sustainable, integrated and inclusive planning in Africa. Founded in 1966, NITP has steadily grown into Africa's leading community of Urban Planners. Our chartered members are spread locally and internationally working in both public and private sectors. Collectively, we foster the attainment of sustainable human settlements. Through professionalism and dedication, we shape our cities of tomorrow through long, medium and short-term development plans and policies.

attributes.name: description
attributes.content: d.light is a global leader in social transformation by making transformative products available and affordable to low-income families. Most of the customers we serve don’t have access to reliable power or financing, and d.light removes those barriers. We enable reliable power through our solar energy solutions and enable financing with our Pay As You Go technology. d.light has sold over 25 million products including solar lanterns, solar home systems, TVs, radios and smartphones, impacting the lives of over 125 million people.

attributes.name: title
attributes.content: The Government of Ghana | Project Pipeline

attributes.name: description
attributes.content: The Government of Ghana was created as a parliamentary democracy, followed by alternating military and civilian governments in Ghana. In January 1993, military government gave way to the Fourth Republic after presidential and parliamentary elections in late 1992. The 1992 constitution divides powers among a president, parliament, cabinet, council of state, and an independent judiciary. The government is elected by universal suffrage.

body.value: The Government of Ghana was created as a parliamentary democracy, followed by alternating military and civilian governments in Ghana. In January 1993, military government gave way to the Fourth Republic after presidential and parliamentary elections in late 1992. The 1992 constitution divides powers among a president, parliament, cabinet, council of state, and an independent judiciary. The government is elected by universal suffrage.
body.processed: The Government of Ghana was created as a parliamentary democracy, followed by alternating military and civilian governments in Ghana. In January 1993, military government gave way to the Fourth Republic after presidential and parliamentary elections in late 1992. The 1992 constitution divides powers among a president, parliament, cabinet, council of state, and an independent judiciary. The government is elected by universal suffrage.

attributes.content: We help countries in both developed and emerging markets across Europe, Africa and the Americas. By creating new and essential infrastructure and replacing ageing services, we hope to improve the quality of people’s lives. Founded in Paris in 2005, we now have eleven offices and over 300 employees around the world, and our projects have created over 170,000 direct and indirect jobs.

attributes.name: title
attributes.content: Cross And Churchill Group | Project Pipeline

attributes.name: description
attributes.content: Founded in 2007, Cross and Churchill Estates Limited [RC No. 776998] has grown to be one of the notable real estate development companies in Lagos, Nigeria. Focusing on the development and sales of both landed and residential properties. We have built a sterling portfolio of properties by creating value in vintage locations and distinctive communities.

body.value:
Founded in 2007, Cross and Churchill Estates Limited [RC No. 776998] has grown to be one of the notable real estate development companies in Lagos, Nigeria. Focusing on the development and sales of both landed and residential properties. We have built a sterling portfolio of properties by creating value in vintage locations and distinctive communities.

While we specialize in creating highly desirable developments and structured transactions, we take the greatest pleasure in creating beautiful communities that enrich lives, relationship that lasts and above all, building trust. To achieve the foregoing, we strive to understand the needs of our clients by working diligently to achieve the results they desire. Over the years, we have developed the knack for creative and out-of-the-box solutions.

As a full service real estate development entity, we have earned a reputation as a respected neighborhood developer known for providing quality development, exceptional services and products to help improve communities and lifestyles. From day one, our focus been on building top-quality developments with maximum value.

As a real estate holding company, Cross and Churchill operates as a vertically integrated group with associated companies and divisions specializing in Real Estate Development; Property Letting, Property Sales and Marketing and Property Management; General Brokerage and Advisory Services and a full range of real estate legal services.

Cross and Churchill also houses it's own development design and construction departments. This unified approach enables us to execute each project with efficiency. Engaging all teams during the development process not only streamlines communication, but also allows us to meticulously oversee the details at each project phase.
body.processed:
Founded in 2007, Cross and Churchill Estates Limited [RC No. 776998] has grown to be one of the notable real estate development companies in Lagos, Nigeria. Focusing on the development and sales of both landed and residential properties. We have built a sterling portfolio of properties by creating value in vintage locations and distinctive communities.

While we specialize in creating highly desirable developments and structured transactions, we take the greatest pleasure in creating beautiful communities that enrich lives, relationship that lasts and above all, building trust. To achieve the foregoing, we strive to understand the needs of our clients by working diligently to achieve the results they desire. Over the years, we have developed the knack for creative and out-of-the-box solutions.

As a full service real estate development entity, we have earned a reputation as a respected neighborhood developer known for providing quality development, exceptional services and products to help improve communities and lifestyles. From day one, our focus been on building top-quality developments with maximum value.

As a real estate holding company, Cross and Churchill operates as a vertically integrated group with associated companies and divisions specializing in Real Estate Development; Property Letting, Property Sales and Marketing and Property Management; General Brokerage and Advisory Services and a full range of real estate legal services.

Cross and Churchill also houses it's own development design and construction departments. This unified approach enables us to execute each project with efficiency. Engaging all teams during the development process not only streamlines communication, but also allows us to meticulously oversee the details at each project phase.

attributes.name: title
attributes.content: AVIC International Holding Corporation (AVIC INTL) | Project Pipeline

attributes.name: description
attributes.content: AVIC International Holding Corporation (AVIC INTL) is a global share-holding enterprise affiliated to Aviation Industry Corporation of China (AVIC). The main business involves four segments: Aviation Business, High-end Manufacturing, Overseas Public Service, and Service & Trade. The corporation owns 6 domestic and overseas listed companies, and has established branches in 60 countries and regions.

body.value:
AVIC International Holding Corporation (AVIC INTL) is a global share-holding enterprise affiliated to Aviation Industry Corporation of China (AVIC). The main business involves four segments: Aviation Business, High-end Manufacturing, Overseas Public Service, and Service & Trade. The corporation owns 6 domestic and overseas listed companies, and has established branches in 60 countries and regions.

With aviation as its core business, AVIC INTL focuses on the development of integrated aviation supply chain service system. The business covers integrated supply chain service, aviation industry networking and industrial data platform, international aviation technology cooperation, integrated services for aviation standard parts/products, aviation operations and support, bidding services, etc.

We uphold the mission of "Go beyond Commerce for a Better World", take advantage of global network and platform, and actively participate in "the Belt and Road Initiative". Focusing on priority sectors, AVIC INTL has engaged in project planning, project financing management, export of electromechanical products, general contracting, operation and maintenance of overseas engineering projects, which has established good brand effects in overseas market and effectively promoted the local economic prosperity

Over 40 years of reform and development, AVIC INTL has implanted the gene of innovation and entrepreneurship, market-orientation and global-orientation into the corporation. A number of famous brands under AVIC INTL, including TIANMA, SCC, RAINBOW and FIYTA have grown up and established competitive advantages in relevant fields. The corporation is serving as a leader in building national brands and is committed to enhancing the presence of Made in China and Chinese brands worldwide through constant promotion of the transformation and upgrading of technology and business model.
body.processed:
AVIC International Holding Corporation (AVIC INTL) is a global share-holding enterprise affiliated to Aviation Industry Corporation of China (AVIC). The main business involves four segments: Aviation Business, High-end Manufacturing, Overseas Public Service, and Service & Trade. The corporation owns 6 domestic and overseas listed companies, and has established branches in 60 countries and regions.

With aviation as its core business, AVIC INTL focuses on the development of integrated aviation supply chain service system. The business covers integrated supply chain service, aviation industry networking and industrial data platform, international aviation technology cooperation, integrated services for aviation standard parts/products, aviation operations and support, bidding services, etc.

We uphold the mission of "Go beyond Commerce for a Better World", take advantage of global network and platform, and actively participate in "the Belt and Road Initiative". Focusing on priority sectors, AVIC INTL has engaged in project planning, project financing management, export of electromechanical products, general contracting, operation and maintenance of overseas engineering projects, which has established good brand effects in overseas market and effectively promoted the local economic prosperity

Over 40 years of reform and development, AVIC INTL has implanted the gene of innovation and entrepreneurship, market-orientation and global-orientation into the corporation. A number of famous brands under AVIC INTL, including TIANMA, SCC, RAINBOW and FIYTA have grown up and established competitive advantages in relevant fields. The corporation is serving as a leader in building national brands and is committed to enhancing the presence of Made in China and Chinese brands worldwide through constant promotion of the transformation and upgrading of technology and business model.

attributes.content: Avic International Real Estate | Project Pipeline

attributes.name: description
attributes.content: A lot of smart and disruptive construction innovations exist today but they remain in the labs of large companies or start ups. Our mission is to take these innovations to the field, optimize them, and scale them up. So that more African families can live, work and study in more decent, sustainable and affordable buildings. 14Trees is a joint venture company between Holcim, a global leader in sustainable construction solutions, and CDC Group, the UK Government's impact investor.

body.value:
A lot of smart and disruptive construction innovations exist today but they remain in the labs of large companies or start ups. Our mission is to take these innovations to the field, optimize them, and scale them up. So that more African families can live, work and study in more decent, sustainable and affordable buildings.

14Trees is a joint venture company between Holcim, a global leader in sustainable construction solutions, and CDC Group, the UK Government's impact investor.

attributes.name: description
attributes.content: MASS Design Group was founded on the understanding that architecture’s influence reaches beyond individual buildings. MASS (Model of Architecture Serving Society) believes that architecture has a critical role to play in supporting communities to confront history, shape new narratives, collectively heal and project new possibilities for the future.

body.value:
MASS Design Group was founded on the understanding that architecture’s influence reaches beyond individual buildings. MASS (Model of Architecture Serving Society) believes that architecture has a critical role to play in supporting communities to confront history, shape new narratives, collectively heal and project new possibilities for the future. 

We are a team of over 200 architects, landscape architects, engineers, builders, furniture designers, makers, writers, filmmakers, and researchers representing 20 countries across the globe. We believe in expanding access to design that is purposeful, healing, and hopeful.

In 2020, MASS was named the Architecture Innovator of the Year by the Wall Street Journal, for our origins in healthcare and commitment to architecture as a medium for healing. In 2019, Architect Magazine ranked MASS fourth in its list of Top 50 Firms in Design and in 2017, MASS was awarded the National Design Award in Architecture, given each year by the Cooper Hewitt, Smithsonian Design Museum.
body.processed:
MASS Design Group was founded on the understanding that architecture’s influence reaches beyond individual buildings. MASS (Model of Architecture Serving Society) believes that architecture has a critical role to play in supporting communities to confront history, shape new narratives, collectively heal and project new possibilities for the future. 

We are a team of over 200 architects, landscape architects, engineers, builders, furniture designers, makers, writers, filmmakers, and researchers representing 20 countries across the globe. We believe in expanding access to design that is purposeful, healing, and hopeful.

In 2020, MASS was named the Architecture Innovator of the Year by the Wall Street Journal, for our origins in healthcare and commitment to architecture as a medium for healing. In 2019, Architect Magazine ranked MASS fourth in its list of Top 50 Firms in Design and in 2017, MASS was awarded the National Design Award in Architecture, given each year by the Cooper Hewitt, Smithsonian Design Museum.

attributes.name: title
attributes.content: The Private Infrastructure Development Group (PIDG) | Project Pipeline

attributes.name: description
attributes.content: Established in 2002, PIDG has addressed market failures that were prevalent in its target markets in sub-Saharan Africa and south and south-east Asia, by demonstrating to the market at large the commercial viability of private infrastructure investment in the poorest countries. These failures include:

body.value:
Established in 2002, PIDG has addressed market failures that were prevalent in its target markets in sub-Saharan Africa and south and south-east Asia, by demonstrating to the market at large the commercial viability of private infrastructure investment in the poorest countries. These failures include:

  • Limited supply of long-term, foreign currency financing for infrastructure projects;
  • Lack of local currency financing options to support infrastructure, largely as a result of limited local capital market development;
  • Absence of bankable projects being developed by the private sector to facilitate private sector investment; and
  • Limited government capacity to support the development of publicly-originated infrastructure projects.

Notwithstanding significant changes in the market, many of the attributes that clearly differentiated PIDG when it was set up remain valid today, including our unique focus on infrastructure, our responsiveness to market changes and our agility and ability to address market gaps.

PIDG occupies a niche, where a large proportion of our activities take place at, near or even beyond the frontier of infrastructure investment where there are few or no other actors.
body.processed:
Established in 2002, PIDG has addressed market failures that were prevalent in its target markets in sub-Saharan Africa and south and south-east Asia, by demonstrating to the market at large the commercial viability of private infrastructure investment in the poorest countries. These failures include:

  • Limited supply of long-term, foreign currency financing for infrastructure projects;
  • Lack of local currency financing options to support infrastructure, largely as a result of limited local capital market development;
  • Absence of bankable projects being developed by the private sector to facilitate private sector investment; and
  • Limited government capacity to support the development of publicly-originated infrastructure projects.

Notwithstanding significant changes in the market, many of the attributes that clearly differentiated PIDG when it was set up remain valid today, including our unique focus on infrastructure, our responsiveness to market changes and our agility and ability to address market gaps.

PIDG occupies a niche, where a large proportion of our activities take place at, near or even beyond the frontier of infrastructure investment where there are few or no other actors.

attributes.name: title
attributes.content: GAS PLUS SYNERGY LIMITED | Project Pipeline

attributes.name: description
attributes.content: GasPlus Synergy is a distinguished company in the African Gas sector specialising in gas field development, maintenance, conveyance, and value optimisation. We are committed to providing technical, strategic and market intelligence support to stakeholders in the energy sector. Gasplus, with over a decade of experience, is focused on driving unique solutions that will transform the energy sector today and in the future!

body.value:
GasPlus Synergy is a distinguished company in the African Gas sector specialising in gas field development, maintenance, conveyance, and value optimisation.

We are committed to providing technical, strategic and market intelligence support to stakeholders in the energy sector. Gasplus, with over a decade of experience, is focused on driving unique solutions that will transform the energy sector today and in the future!

Gasplus is in partnership with the Nigerian Liquefied Natural Gas Company (NLNG) to domesticate and boost liquefied natural gas supply in sub-Saharan Africa.

attributes.name: description
attributes.content: The Technical Assistance Facility (TAF) provides project promoters, under the S3P-Industry platform, the opportunity to work with business, corporate finance and legal experts from leading business advisory firms to improve their business plans and investment readiness of their projects.

body.value:
The Technical Assistance Facility (TAF) provides project promoters, under the S3P-Industry platform, the opportunity to work with business, corporate finance and legal experts from leading business advisory firms to improve their business plans and investment readiness of their projects.

The experts provide tailored advice on a wide range of topics. These include, but are not limited to, appropriate financial structuring and mix of funding sources, investment vehicles, governance rules, business models, review of marketing and sales strategies, financials, cash flow analysis, due diligence preparations and intellectual property rights.
body.processed:
The Technical Assistance Facility (TAF) provides project promoters, under the S3P-Industry platform, the opportunity to work with business, corporate finance and legal experts from leading business advisory firms to improve their business plans and investment readiness of their projects.

The experts provide tailored advice on a wide range of topics. These include, but are not limited to, appropriate financial structuring and mix of funding sources, investment vehicles, governance rules, business models, review of marketing and sales strategies, financials, cash flow analysis, due diligence preparations and intellectual property rights.
